description.value:
You rig a snare to disorient a creature with a quick bash, leaving it with little ability to defend itself. The trap deals @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage to the first creature to enter its square; that creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|showDC:all|dc:32] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is off-guard for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is off-guard for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 4}.
